Suggested_Setup: Heavy rain/sandstorm slows travel and obscures vision.
A vehicle breaks down, a strap snaps, or a weapon jams.
Food is found to be rotten or infested. Lose supplies.
A party member gets a cold/fever (stat penalty).
The party gets turned around; lose time or gain exhaustion.
An item goes missing during a rest (stolen by animal or NPC).
Bugs/vermin get into the gear; annoyance and minor damage.
The party follows a lead that turns out to be a dead end.
A horse/vehicle throws a shoe or breaks a wheel.
A spooky event lowers party morale (save vs Fear).
A loud accident gives away the party's position to nearby enemies.
A bureaucrat ties the party up in red tape, wasting time.
Quicksand/mud slows progress and requires strength to escape.
Noisy environment prevents a good rest (no healing).
The party offends a local NPC, increasing prices/hostility.
Water/fuel container leaks, losing valuable resources.
Sudden water forces a retreat to high ground, abandoning the path.
Pollen/spores cause blinding sneezing or rashes.
Acidic rain damages armor/exposed gear.
Players see a Wanted poster for themselves; stealth is harder.
